ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Siri Speech team is looking for talented and motivated Tools Engineer who is passionate about debugging and solving complex problems in human-computer interaction involving spoken language, audio and machine learning. As member of the team, you will work with talented researchers and engineers and will be responsible for designing and creating innovative automation tools to improve end-to-end Siri experience on various devices in the Siri ecosystem.

ul.li: Approximately 3+ years of experience on design and implementing automation tools for engineering teams.
Excellent in creative problem solving and debugging in speech and audio systems.
Strong skills in script language such as Python, Ruby, and Shell scripting.
Experience with Speech/Audio analysis, measurement and classification.
Experience in Audio, DSP, and speech recognition systems.

div.p: Create automation tools for audio/data collection and analysis. Build rapid prototypes for automation software for testing and automation for Siri. Analyze logs and audio to mine and debug problems on the client as well as the sever. Communicate and work with cross-functional teams. Familiarity with mobile automation frameworks and large scale data analysis using MapReduce, SGE
B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent
